mapper.insert: insert into tb_stock_info(stock_code, stock_name, stock_industry) values(?, ?, ?)
mapper.update: update tb_stock_info set stock_code=1 where id=102130213
mapper.create: CREATE TABLE 'tb_stock_info'( 'id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'stock_code' varchar(6) NOT NULL UNIQUE, 'stock_name' varchar(100) NOT NULL, 'stock_industry' VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '未知')
